title: GradientBorder doesn't animate
description: GradientBorder component border/gradient is not animating. Should have animated gradient flow around the border.

title: GitHub cards: tabs and star tags unreadable on background
description: On the GitHub repo cards, the tabs at the top and the star count tags have poor contrast against the GitHub background. Need better backgrounds or text shadows for readability.

title: TypewriterText flashing letters rapidly between effects
description: In Loading States section, the TypewriterText components flash text/letters super fast in between each typewriter cycle. Should be a clean pause between cycles, not rapid flashing.

title: Portfolio Portal: Projects Grid Page
description: Update /projects page to use real GitHub data from useGitHubRepos. Wire InfiniteGrid cardData to actual repos. Add category filtering with MazSelect.
close_reason: Wired dashboard InfiniteGrid to real GitHub data with category filtering and loading states

title: Portfolio Portal: GitHub Data Layer
description: Create useGitHubRepos composable to fetch repos from GitHub API, transform to CardData format, cache with useState. Include manual overrides for featured projects (TabzChrome, ClaudeGlobalCommands, etc).

title: Portfolio Portal: Project Detail Drawer
description: Add MazDrawer or MazDialog for project details when clicking a grid tile. Show full description, tech stack tags, star count, links to GitHub and live demo.

title: TiltCard animation not working
description: TiltCard 3D perspective tilt effect is not animating on hover. Should show subtle 3D tilt with spotlight effect.

title: White header text too bright/blinding
description: The white text in headers on the landing page is too bright and harsh. Consider reducing brightness or adding subtle glow instead of pure white.

title: Add project detail drawer
description: When clicking a project in the grid or featured section, show MazDrawer with full details: description, tech stack, star count, links to GitHub and live demo.

title: Add search/filter to projects grid
description: Add MazInput search and MazSelect category filter to the /dashboard projects grid page.

title: GradientBorder has extra border taking half the card
description: GradientBorder component has an extra border at the bottom that takes up about half the card height. Should just be a thin glowing border around the edges.

title: Portfolio Portal: Enhanced Hero
description: Enhance index.vue hero with featured project spotlight cards (MazCardSpotlight or custom). Show top 3-4 starred repos. Add smooth scroll to projects section.
close_reason: Enhanced hero with terminal theme, animated counters, team section, featured projects

title: Landing page badges missing CSS - square corners, no padding
description: At the top of the landing page, the 'Agent Orchestrated' and 'Human Supervised' tags have square corners with no padding. Looks like missing CSS classes - should have rounded corners and proper padding.

title: Wire /lab page effects to landing page
description: Integrate the best effects from /lab playground into the main landing page. Pick 2-3 that work well together.
close_reason: Integrated 5 effects: Meteors, SpotlightCursor, TiltCard, FlickeringGrid, ScrollReveal - commit a745d42

title: Featured Projects cards too bright on hover - text unreadable
description: When hovering Featured Projects cards, the brightness makes text hard to read. Need to reduce hover brightness or add text shadow/contrast.

title: TiltCard has square reflection floating into card
description: TiltCard has a square-shaped spotlight/reflection that floats visibly into the card area. Should be a subtle glow that follows cursor, not a visible square shape.

title: Three.js Terminal3DScene doesn't match design - consider removing
description: The Terminal3DScene component doesn't look like the intended 3D terminal design. May not be needed on the landing page - consider removing or replacing with something that fits better.

title: Meteors background missing/not visible
description: Meteors effect on landing page is not visible or missing. Should show purple falling particles behind aurora section.

title: Text effects look identical - white with glow causing blinding headers
description: The text effects in the first /lab component all look the same. They use white text with color glow which is likely causing the blinding header issue across the site. Consider using off-white/slate text with subtle glow instead of pure white.

title: Aurora Background animation barely visible
description: Aurora Background animation is very subtle/hard to tell it's animating. Consider increasing opacity, movement speed, or color intensity.

title: FlickeringGrid flickers too fast
description: The FlickeringGrid component flickers too quickly. Slow down the flicker rate for a more subtle, less distracting effect.
